name: Food Factory
description: Food Factory is game where players can produce food using various machines starting from gathering base products. Buy lands for your factory, build efficient production lines, expand, gather, explore. Drive more than 10 vehicles, including harvesters, forklifts trucks, pickups and even Tuskla. Export your finished products or deliver them to local sellers. Use different side missions to gather money. You can even furnish your home or factory.
